meanings.sent1: The bird's pennated wings helped it soar through the sky.
meanings.sent2: The angel's pennated wings were a beautiful sight to behold.
meanings.sent3: The pennated wings of the airplane made it look like a giant bird.
meanings.sent4: Her pennated hair flowed behind her like a graceful wing.
meanings.sent5: The pennated feathers of the peacock shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The pennated leaves of the palm tree swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The pennated design of the fan gave it an elegant look.
meanings.sent3: The pennated pattern on the carpet made it seem like a forest floor.
meanings.sent4: Her pennated dress cascaded down in layers like delicate feathers.
meanings.sent5: The pennated edges of the book pages gave them a unique texture.

meanings.definition: Having a structure resembling a feather
meanings.sent1: The pennated leaves of the fern added a touch of nature to the room.
meanings.sent2: The pennated petals of the flower created a stunning display.
meanings.sent3: The pennated design on the cake made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her pennated eyelashes fluttered like tiny feathers.
meanings.sent5: The pennated edges of the clouds painted a beautiful sunset sky.
